section.title: Converting YAML to JSON in Oxygen
section.p: includes a useful and simple tool for converting YAML files to JSON. It even works on files that consist of multiple YAML documents, each separated by three dashes (---), in which case the conversion creates multiple JSON files with a number in the name.

The YAML to JSON action for invoking the tool can be found in the Tools JSON Tools
XML Tools JSON Tools menu.
To convert a YAML document to JSON, follow these steps:

li.p:
Select the YAML to JSON action from the
Tools JSON Tools
XML Tools JSON Tools menu.
The YAML to JSON dialog box is displayed:

ol.li: Choose or enter the YAML URL for the document you want to convert.
Choose the path of the Output file that will contain the resulting JSON document.
[Optional] Select the Open in Editor option to open the resulting JSON document in the main editing pane.

section.p: Result: The original YAML document is now converted to a JSON document.
